attributes.comment:
I cannot believe that our government would look to increase the cost of adoption at all
let alone 66%. It is already costing almost $20,000 to bring our little girl home and we
are doing everything we can to do this without killing ourselves. I understand that the
adoption process is expensive (BELIEVE ME!!!!) but I cannot see that the cost of
processing a piece of paperwork can increase 66%. This is absolutely rediculous to
even believe that you feel that the cost of adoption is increasing at a higher rate than
utilities and OIL!!! Please reconsider your decision to make the adoption process more
expensive! There are so many families out there who desire a family and so many
children that NEED a family. DO NOT increase the price so much that you stop this
from happening!

Very Concerned,

Patrick Harrington
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Patrick Harrington
